verbs.description: In an alternate universe , a Trump - like Hillary Clinton [V: has] declared herself the most successful president ever . Measured by conservative outrage , 100 % true .

[ARGM-LOC: In an alternate universe] , [ARG0: a Trump - like Hillary Clinton] has [V: declared] [ARG1: herself the most successful president ever] . [ARGM-ADV: Measured by conservative outrage , 100 % true] .
In an alternate universe , a Trump - like Hillary Clinton has declared herself the most successful president ever . [V: Measured] [ARG3: by conservative outrage] , 100 % true .
